column4: Hello in here. We have a problem with Google Earth. We have downloaded that on to Ubuntu 11.04 but the text is not wery easy to read.
By the way it's in 32 bit
perhaps you need to install the ms fonts, or some other fonts.
i suggest using the one in the repos.
take a screen shot. check the forums and askubuntu.com to see if others have issues.
interesting - seems to be using a monospaced font.
as a test. you could try making a new user, and see if the newly  made user has a simile rissue
It's not shown the way it used to stand
you did logout after installing the ms fonts?
first hit i got when googled for 'ubuntu google earth fonts' --> http://ubuntuguide.net/install-google-earth-and-fix-ugly-fonts-in-ubuntu-11-04-natty
time to log out then.. and see.. after running that command above
you just cut/paste the exact line he gave....
